title: Missing Required Sections in Audit Reports
description: Audit evaluation reports are missing required 'Purpose/Overview' and 'Version History' sections.

steps: Add Purpose/Overview section describing the audit scope
Add Version History table at the bottom

title: Missing Version History in Summary
description: Summary document is missing the required Version History table.

steps: Add Version History table at the bottom

title: Broken External Links
description: 69 broken external links found, including placeholder domains and broken GitHub API references.

steps: Replace placeholder URLs with actual documentation links or code blocks

title: Orphaned Documents
description: Documents exist but are not linked from any other documentation file.
evidence: File not found in grep search of other docs

steps: Link these documents from README.md or relevant index files
Or move to archive if no longer needed
Or convert to a tracked issue/task

title: Markdown Line Length Violations
description: Lines exceed 500 characters, violating linting rules.

title: Invalid Link Fragments
description: Links to anchors that do not exist or are malformed.

steps: Verify anchor names in target sections
Update links to match actual headings

title: Misplaced Documentation Files
description: Template file is in docs/decisions/ but should be in docs/templates/. Also flagged as temporary.

title: Unused Link Definitions
description: Templates contain unused link definitions (likely placeholders).
evidence: Unused link or image reference definition: "choice 1"

steps: Comment out or remove unused link definitions in templates
Or ensure they are used in examples

title: Potential Misplaced Plans in Archive/Templates
description: Files ending in _PLAN.md are flagged as misplaced by the placement script, but may be correctly located in archive or templates directories.

steps: Verify if script logic needs update to allow plans in archive/templates
